    Function reference

    All functions

    binomial.example.data()
    Simulate input grouped data (binomial outcome) for testing with ptLasso.
    coef(<cv.ptLasso>)
    Get the coefficients from a fitted cv.ptLasso model.
    coef(<ptLasso>)
    Get the coefficients from a fitted ptLasso model.
    cv.ptLasso()
    Cross-validation for ptLasso
    gaussian.example.data()
    Simulate input grouped data (gaussian outcome) for testing with ptLasso.
    get.individual.support()
    Get the support for individual models
    get.overall.support()
    Get the support for the overall model
    get.pretrain.support()
    Get the support for pretrained models
    makedata()
    Simulate input grouped data for testing with ptLasso.
    makedata.targetgroups()
    Simulate target grouped data for testing with ptLasso.
    plot(<cv.ptLasso>)
    Plot the cross-validation curve produced by cv.ptLasso, as a function of the alpha values used.
    plot(<ptLasso>)
    Plot the models trained by a ptLasso object
    predict(<cv.ptLasso>)
    Predict using a cv.ptLasso object.
    predict(<ptLasso>)
    Predict using a ptLasso object.
    print(<cv.ptLasso>)
    Print the cv.ptLasso object.
    print(<predict.cv.ptLasso>)
    Print the predict.cv.ptLasso object.
    print(<predict.ptLasso>)
    Print the predict.ptLasso object.
    print(<ptLasso>)
    Print the ptLasso object.
    ptLasso()
    Fit a pretrained lasso model using glmnet.
